title: How to stop league from hijacking my keyboard command?
body:
League is the only game where it hijacks my keyboard "Next song" command 
When I play other games in windowed mode
I can easily use the keyboard command "Play next song" ">>|"

Any way I can configure the game setting to let me do this?

replies.body:
Tried this 
Though I changed my league location to another location 
Folder E:\
Folder C doesnt have much room
Used "Open file location" on my league client

Deleted Config menu 
Made a custom game and tried
To switch my music
Still no dice
Restored keyboard setting in my league 
with restore default 
again no dice 

Not sure what else I can try...

Using the media player
mediamonkey by the way I can try this with another 
mediaplayer, not sure if it will help

Hmmmmm this makes me think that League's keybinds might be taking precedence over your normal windows keybinds. I'm not quite 100% sure if this will work, but let's go ahead and try resetting your config files for League to see if that helps. 

DISCLAIMER: This **will** reset any custom keybinds or settings you have. You'll need to set all of those up again after doing these steps.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
